headline: Wells Fargo Sees Near-Term Pressure at Mosaic (MOS) but Steadier Outlook Ahead
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is included among the Best Low Risk Stocks for a Retirement Stock Portfolio. On January 23, Wells Fargo analyst Michael Sison lowered The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS)’s price target to $27 from $28 and kept an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The change followed a softer view on fourth-quarter volumes, with Brazil […]
